title: 108_hr3692
content: Bullying Prevention for School Safety and Crime Reduction Act of 2003 - Amends: (1) the Safe and Drug-Free Schools and Communities Act to cover bullying prevention. And (2) the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to authorize establishing and maintaining accountability-based programs that are designed to enhance school safety, which may include research-based bullying prevention programs.
